item.title: Dynamically Updating Custom Menu of Google Spreadsheet using Google Apps Script
item.description: Gists This is a sample script for dynamically updating the custom menu of Google Spreadsheet using Google Apps Script. Demo In this demonstration, when the Spreadsheet is opened, 5 functions added to the custom menu. You can see that when a column is added and deleted, the custom menu is updated. Issue and workaround for this goal Unfortunately, in the current stage, when a function is added to the custom menu with addItem method, the argument cannot been able to be used.
